about_the_game:
No Food No Drink Demo, a game where you step into the shoes of a devious student on a mission to fulfil your hunger.

You can earn snacks or drinks as rewards.

Use your tools to avoid detection.

Take on various tasks from your fellow students, from finding lost items to solving tricky puzzles.

Key Features:

  • Earn Rewards: Collect a variety of snacks and drinks as rewards for your hard work.

  • Stealth Mode: Enjoy your treats without getting caught by the librarian. Use your tools to avoid detection.

  • Vibrant Library Environment: Use your earned points to purchase a variety of items from the shop.

  • Vibrant Library Environment: Explore a lively school library filled with interactive elements and hidden secrets.

  • Variety of maps: The librarian’s patrol pattern & security level change each map.

name: No Food No Drink Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 156 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 367 MB available space

short_description: Enjoy delicious snacks, earn rewards, and navigate whilst avoiding the librarian. Equip yourself with many tools to distract others creatively. Assist your classmates and prepare to face challenges in this stealth-strategy game at different time or weather.
